entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being referred to as a person who has gained fame due to the death of his parents at the hands of Voldemort. He is described as someone who tells 'ridiculous tall stories' and wants to keep his fame going.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as being behind a plot to turn Harry into someone nobody will believe. It implies that Fudge has some kind of influence or power over the media or public opinion.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who killed Harry's parents and failed to kill him. This event led to Harry gaining fame.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who knows what Harry is going through and is trying to comfort him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who knows about the dementors attacking Harry and thinks it should have been a big story.

relationships.description: Fudge is trying to manipulate public opinion by turning Harry into someone nobody will believe.
